data.message:
"Letter to Eminem
fuck you, fuck my wife, fuck my house, fuck bitches, fuck my work, fuck Dido, fuck alla the world, fuck shoes, fuck jeans, fuck t-shirt, i want marry you 
Love you, Stan"
Ahahhahahaha kiss from Italy
